org.openadaptor.spring.jmx
Interface JMXManagedSpringAdaptorMBean

All Known Implementing Classes:
JMXManagedSpringAdaptor
public interface JMXManagedSpringAdaptorMBean

Interface for a SpringAdaptor exposable as a JMX mbean compliant with JBoss service contract.

Author:
Kris Lachor
See Also:
JMXManagedSpringAdaptor

Method Detail

runSpringAdaptor

public void runSpringAdaptor(java.lang.String configFileName)
Runs SpringAdaptor defined in configFileName.

Parameters:
configFileName - name of the Spring config file that defines the adaptor

stopSpringAdaptor

public void stopSpringAdaptor()
Stops SpringAdaptor.

dumpState

public java.lang.String dumpState()
OA state

Returns:
OA state

start

public void start()
A JMX management method required by JBoss service contract. Exposes OA as a JBoss service (called by JBoss app server).

stop

public void stop()
A JMX management method required by JBoss service contract. Stops exposing OA as JBoss service (called by JBoss app server).

isStarted

public boolean isStarted()
A JMX management method required by JBoss service contract.

Returns:
true if this mbean has been started as a JBoss service (called by JBoss app server), false otherwise
